name: NSHapticFeedbackPerformer
desc: A set of methods and constants that a haptic feedback performer implements.

items.name: func perform(NSHapticFeedbackManager.FeedbackPattern, performanceTime: NSHapticFeedbackManager.PerformanceTime)
items.desc: Initiates a specific pattern of haptic feedback to the user.

items.name: enum NSHapticFeedbackManager.FeedbackPattern
items.desc: A pattern of haptic feedback to be provided to the user.

items.name: enum NSHapticFeedbackManager.PerformanceTime
items.desc: A time at which to provide haptic feedback to the user.
